Token.Abstract: The PWMapViewDelegate protocol defines a set of optional methods that you can use to receive building-related update messages. Because many map operations require the PWMapView class to load data asynchronously, the map view calls these methods to notify your application when specific operations complete. PWMapViewDelegate inherits from MKMapViewDelegate.
Tells the delegate that the specified map view successfully changed the building floor.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that changed the floor.

Parameter.Name: currentFloor
Parameter.Abstract: The current floor displayed on the map view.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified map view successfully loaded necessary building data.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified view was unable to load the building data.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

Parameter.Name: buildingID
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier for the building that the map view tried to load data for.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The reason that the map data could not be loaded.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the map view will start tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s location.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the map view stopped tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that stopped tracking the user’s indoor location.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the indoor location of the user was updated.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s location.

Parameter.Name: userLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location object representing the user’s latest location. This property may be nil.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that an attempt to locate the user’s position failed.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object containing the reason why location tracking failed.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the location of the user was updated.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view whose user tracking mode changed.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Abstract: The mode used to track the user’s location.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, mode change is animated; otherwise, it is not. This parameter affects only tracking mode changes.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user's location has been snapped to a route.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view snapping locations to a route.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user's location was not snapped to a route.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view no longer snapping locations to a route.
